alert.note: Alert for Forrest; Lamar; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 9:03PM CDT until April 13 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Marion County in south central Mississippi... Forrest County in southeastern Mississippi... Lamar County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 902 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oak Grove, or near West Hattiesburg, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hattiesburg around 910 PM CDT. Petal around 915 PM CDT. Sunrise around 920 PM CDT. Mclaurin around 925 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central and southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
